author: kamil_chodola
content:
So we checked once more now, solved one issue which was slight missconfig on our end, resynced one of our local non validator nodes and we have gasUsed mismatch gas used: expected 33324, got 23564 (diff: -9760)

We are checking  now on it - block was produced by Reth so we need to check now if the gas calculation was wrong on our end or on Reth
